title: Scalar Multiplication
text: Scalar multiplication involves finding the product of a constant by each entry in the matrix. Given $$A=\begin{bmatrix} a_{1,1} & a_{1,2} \\ a_{2,1} & a_{2,2} \end{bmatrix}$$, the scalar multiple\n$$c A$$ is $$c A=c*\begin{bmatrix} a_{1,1} & a_{1,2} \\ a_{2,1} & a_{2,2} \end{bmatrix}=\begin{bmatrix} c a_{1,1} & c a_{1,2} \\ c a_{2,1} & c a_{2,2} \end{bmatrix}$$
speech: Scalar multiplication involves finding the product of a constant by each entry in the matrix.
